member this.Pin : unit -> System.Buffers.MemoryHandle

Docs.summary: Creates a handle for the memory. The GC will not move the memory until the returned is disposed, enabling taking and using the memory's address.
Docs.returns: A instance wrapping the pinned handle.
Docs.exception: An instance with nonprimitive (non-blittable) members cannot be pinned.
